## NS.sprintf() method

Complete open source JavaScript sprintf implementation

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sprintf(format: string, ...args: string[]): string;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  format | string | String to format. |
|  args | string\[\] | Formating arguments. |
